articles.title: Michael Cohen's damning hush money testimony about Trump's role in Stormy Daniels' payoff: top moments
articles.description: The former fixer paid off Stormy Daniels in October 2016 to buy her silence about her claim that she slept with Trump ten years prior. The D.A.’s lawyers charge that Trump then reimbursed Cohen for the $130,000 payment — in the process of falsifying business records — all to conceal a scheme to influence the results of the election.
